obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_28_0: You, that&left us in&the shadows,&stripped of&meaning.../%
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_43_0: Then, you may&see what it is&like to live&in DESPAIR!/%
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_105_0: * KING's mouths gave a berserk smile.
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_169_0: * KING - Abandoned by the Lightners^1, his heart became cracked with hatred./
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_170_0: * He cannot be reasoned with^1, but don't give up...!/%
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_180_0: * You tried to reason with the King.../
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_183_0: * Your very existence goes against our own.../
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_184_0: \E0* By the Knight's will^1, I shall shatter your heart to pieces!/
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_201_0: * You encouraged the party^1!&* The party's DEFENSE raised for this turn!/%
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_214_0: * Susie tried to reason with the King.../
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_218_0: \EC* So if we can get by without hurting you^1, then.../
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_220_0: * If I perish^1, so be it!/
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_221_0: \E4* Show my son the monster you REALLY are!/
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_224_0: \E3* Arright^1, you wanna see what I can do^1, huh?/
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_226_0: * Susie's will is changing..^1.&* \cYTALK\cW became \cYRED BUSTER\cW!/%
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_241_0: * Your SOUL shined its power on Susie!/%
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_254_0: * Ralsei tried to reason with the King.../
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_256_0: * You might not realize it^1, but.../
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_257_0: \E6* This is a world where you don't have to fight./
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_258_0: \E8* I know if we try^1, we can all find another way.../
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_261_0: \E0* A shame you will not live to realize your naivety./
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_262_0: \E4* Now^1, perish with the pathetic LIGHTNERs you worship!/
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_264_0: * Sorry^1, my friends and I aren't going anywhere!/
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_266_0: * Ralsei's will is changing..^1.&* \cYTALK\cW became \cYDUAL HEAL\cW!/%
obj_king_boss_slash_Step_0_gml_282_0: * Your SOUL shined its power on RALSEI!/%
